value.title: Filter Context in DAX
value.excerpt: Understanding the difference between a row context and a filter context is the first and most important concept to learn to use DAX correctly. This video introduces the filter context. Article and download: https://sql.bi/747800?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The

value.title: Understanding context transition
value.excerpt: Context transition is one of the most obscure topics for DAX newbies. Learn how it works, its effects, and how to leverage it rather than be scared of it. Article and download: https://sql.bi/751407?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI

Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/

value.title: Modify DAX filter context in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to describe filter context, which is used to evaluate measure formulas. You'll then learn why some calculations need to modify filter context and that it can be achieved by using the CALCULATE function. Additionally, you'll learn how to configure the CALCULATE function with filters and filter modifiers.
